seo.title: ONE360 Revolve Hire Sydney | 360 Photo Booth Green Screen
seo.description: Transform Your Event with Customisable Green Screen Technology. Hire ONE360 Revolve in Sydney and Replace the Background With Your Chosen Theme or Brand.

contentHtml:
360 Video Booth Hire

SYDNEY | MELBOURNE | BRISBANE

Ultimate Green Screen
360 Video Experience

Transform Your Event with Customisable Green Screen Technology. Capture memories to last a lifetime with more than just a photo.

Book Today

Instead of a fixed event backdrop, guests can be placed in exciting, animated, or themed digital environments—from a red-carpet premiere to an exotic paradise, a futuristic cityscape, or a fully branded corporate setting.

Hire Our ONE360 Revolve Today

ONE360 Revolve combines the immersive power of 360° video technology with a high-quality green screen, allowing you to create dynamic, branded, and visually stunning experiences.

Take your event visuals to the next level with ONE360 Revolve, our Green Screen 360 Video Booth that offers limitless creative possibilities. This next-generation experience replaces the traditional background with fully customisable digital environments, transporting guests to any location, theme, or branded backdrop you can imagine.

How ONE360 Revolve Works?

360 Video Booth Hire in Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane

Experience the magic of custom green screen technology with ONE360 Revolve. Our innovative 360° video booth transforms any event by placing guests in fully customisable virtual environments—whether it’s a branded backdrop, a dream destination, or a futuristic setting. Here’s how it works:

Prepare

Guests strike their best poses as our 360° video booth begins recording.

Green-Screen Magic

Our advanced tech instantly replaces the background with your custom visuals or branding.

Share

Guests receive their custom-branded videos via SMS, email, or direct social media uploads

Endless Creative Possibilities
for all events.

No matter the event, ONE360 Revolve brings your vision to life with fully customisable green screen backgrounds and cinematic effects.

HD Slow-Motion Videos

Capture every movement with crystal-clear quality and cinematic detail.

Guests instantly receive their personalised, branded videos via email and SMS.

Custom Branding

Enhance videos with logos, music, effects, and overlays for a unique brand experience.

Experiential Activation

Create an immersive and interactive experience that captivates audiences.

Professional On-Site Attendants

Dedicated experts ensure a flawless and premium guest experience.

Social Media Integration

Optimised for viral engagement across Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn.

360° Video, Infinite Possibilities- Book ONE360 Revolve today.

Hire Our ONE360 Revolve Today

With ONE360 Revolve, your imagination is the limit! Whether you want to recreate a Hollywood red carpet, a luxury brand showcase, or an outer space adventure, our green screen technology makes it possible.

Ready to wow your guests with a next-level interactive experience? Contact us today to bring ONE360 Revolve to your event and make every moment unforgettable!

Whether you’re hosting a corporate event, brand activation, wedding, or product launch, our customisable backgrounds will leave a lasting impression.

FAQs.

What is 360 Video Booth Hire?

360 Video Booth Hire by ONE360 offers an immersive video experience at events, capturing high-quality, shareable 360° videos that guests can enjoy and share instantly.

How does the ONE360 platform work?

It’s simple! Guests step onto our platform, the camera captures a full 360° view in seconds, and they receive a shareable video to download instantly to their social media.

Do you have slo-mo video recording?

Yes! We offer slow-motion video recording, adding an extra layer of fun and drama to the captured moments.

What types of events are best for ONE360?

ONE360 is perfect for any event—from weddings and birthdays to corporate events and brand activations. It adds an engaging, unique element that guests love.

How quickly are videos ready to share?

Videos are ready almost instantly! After recording, guests can quickly download and share their clips across social platforms.

Do you provide staff to operate the platform?


Yes, we provide trained staff to set up, operate the platform, and assist guests so the experience is smooth and enjoyable.

Can the videos be branded or customised?

Absolutely! We offer options to add custom branding, logos, or messages, making it ideal for corporate events and promotions.

How do I book ONE360 for my event?

Booking is easy—just reach out through our website or contact us directly, and we’ll help you secure your event date and answer any additional questions.
